title: Import RESTful requests from WADLs to Katalon Studio
description: Starting version 7.7.0, Katalon Studio supports the import of WADL files to create RESTful requests. This section shows you how to import a WADL file into a Katalon project. Refer to the sample WADL description given here.

frontMatter.title: Import RESTful requests from WADLs to Katalon Studio
